providers.Description: API for access to the CellXGene Discover corpus.  For detail of how to use cxg_dataset accessions to download h5ad files see [Downloading-the-original-source-H5AD-file-of-a-dataset](https://chanzuckerberg.github.io/cellxgene-census/notebooks/api_demo/census_datasets.html#Downloading-the-original-source-H5AD-file-of-a-dataset).

providers.description: Web portal hosting single cell matrix datasets in browsable form.
